pages.text: Turns out that all it took to create the next container was to use composition to combine some ender dust and a midnight jewel. Not only did they stick together, they created something more. The $(item)Soul Catalyst$() is like a midnight jewel but with tentacles of darkness. That is, until it's filled with more essence.

This single item contains such an incredible amount of soulus. It's as powerful as a human soul. Maybe even more powerful. If there was a way to transfer the soulus at a steady rate into a summoner, it would function in the absence of a human.$(p)$(l:legacy/soul_totem)Luckily, there is.$()
